SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Actor
Actor class representing a moving entity for Level 2 of the game, an Actor moves in a square pattern and if an Actor comes into contact with Chap, the game is over and the level will restart.
Actor.Direction
 
AnimatedImage
Animated Image Accepts a List of RenderImg, it then goes through that list and rendering the next one in the list, and going back to the first item once the list has been exhausted.
App
Main class for the game application.
App.Action
Functional interface for actions Used to store actions in a map and showcase the use of strategy pattern
App.AppState
 
AppNotifier
Domain need to be able to notify App certain events, such as the game being won or lost.
AudioP
This class is responsible for loading audio files into memory.
Builder
Fluid builder for nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.domain.Maze
Canary
Test record to test Jackson
Chap
Chap class represents the main playable character of the game, Chap is able to move throughout the levels, pick up items and open doors.
Chap.Direction
 
ComponentFactory
Factory class for creating Swing components with common/ custom settings.
ComponentFactory.infoPanel
Custom JPanel with title and value pair.
Controller
Controller class that extends Keys class.
Coord
Used to track row and col independent of useage (Room inside Builder, Tile within Room, Tile within Maze)
DeserialiseRunnable
 
DirectoryStructure
For Directory Structure, alot of it was "inspired" from Assigment 1.
Exit
 
ExitLockTile
 
ExitRoom
 
FreeTile
 
Fuzz
The fuzz testing class randomly generates input in order to "play" the game, therefore allowing us to brute force many different game situations It is enhanced with some intelligence - it will choose any tiles next to it that have not been yet visited and keep track of all visited tiles
GameDialogs
GameDialogs enum class that contains all the dialogs that can be shown in the game.
GameInfoPanel
A panel that displays the game information, including the time, level, keys, and treasures.
GameState
GameState class represents the state the game is currently in.
GameStateController
GameState class represents the entry point for the other modules to use to access and interact with the main logic of the game.
Img
Img class using Singleton pattern to load and cache images.
ImgOld
This is the class that is responsible for LOADING the Images into Cache only and finding them It's important to note that if the Enum's name as a file doesn't exist in the imgs folder it WILL break eg.
InfoFieldTile
 
Item
 
Key
 
Keys
Keys class to handle key events This class was adopted from the swen 225 assignment 1 with some modifications to handle key combinations, and pause method.
KeyTile
 
Level1
Used to build level1.json file
level2
Used to build level2.json file
Loader
Enrty point for Persistency module De-serialises .json files into levels
LoadFile
De-serialises .json files into levels
LockedDoorTile
 
Main
Main class to start the game This class is the entry point for the game.
Maze
Maze class represents a 2D array of tiles used in the game for each Level, also holds information for each tile in the array and includes method to access that information.
MenuPanel
A panel that displays the menu options, options include: - Pause/ unpause the game.
MockAppNotifier
Mock class for AppNotifier Used to test SerialRunnable
MockController
Mock Controller for fuzz testing.
Paths
Contains all the relevant File paths for persistency
PauseDialog
A dialog that displays a message when the game is paused.
PersistencyTest
Tests for Persistency module
PortalRoom
 
Recorder
Class used by the App module to generate a Recorder object.
Recorder.ChapEvent
Wraps Chap's movement into an object to be read at a later point.
Recorder.ChapEventDeserializer
Deserializes JSON into ChapEvent objects.
Recorder.ChapEventSerializer
Serializes ChapEvent objects to JSON.
Recorder.Event
Interface representing an event in the game.
Recorder.EventDeserializer
Deserializes JSON into Event objects, handling both generic Events and ChapEvents.
Recorder.EventSerializer
Serializes generic Event objects to JSON.
Recorder.FileOperation
Wrapper allowing file operations to be given as arguments without worrying about dealing with exception first.
Recorder.RecordingChanges
Represents changes made by recorder to the game to be consumed by App
RecorderPanel
A panel that displays the recorder options, options include: - Step forward, step back one step.
RecorderTestsAll
 
RecorderTestsWithoutSaveOrLoad
 
RecorderTestsWithSaveOrLoad
 
RecordingFileChooser
Provides a custom file chooser UI for selecting and operating on JSON recording files.
Renderer
This is the Renderer that handles the logic for rendering.
RenderImg
Deprecated.
Room
Composite class for persistency.Builder Used to set rooms within the produced Maze
SaveFile
Used to serialise level state
Saver
Entry point to persistency module Used to serialise level state
Seeds
 
SerialiseRunnable
 
SerialRunnable
 
SidePanel
SidePanel class manages the display of MenuPanel and RecorderPanel.
SidePanel.Mode
 
TeleportTile
 
Tests
 
Tile
Super class that all tiles in the game will extend from.
Treasure
 
TreasureTile
 
UpdatedAnimation
UpdatedAnimation handles animations by cycling through multiple image frames.
WallTile
 
WaterRoom
Room with water around centre
WaterTile
Water Tile that will end game and restart level if Chap touches it,
